data.name: ControlTitle_edit.Text
data.value: Edit Security Roles

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Edit Security Roles

Administrators can manage the security roles defined for their portal. The module allows you to add new security roles, modify existing security roles, delete security roles, and manage the users assigned to security roles.

data.name: plRoleGroups.Text
data.value: Role Group

data.name: plRoleGroups.Help
data.value: Select the Role Group to which this role belongs.

data.name: plRSVPCode.Text
data.value: RSVP Code:

data.name: plRSVPCode.Help
data.value: Enter an RSVP Code for the role. This code can be used to provide a fast method for users to subscribe to one or more roles.

data.name: plIcon.Text
data.value: Icon:

data.name: plIcon.Help
data.value: Select an icon for the role.

data.name: DuplicateRole.Text
data.value: A role with the same name already exists. The role was not added.
